scripts.build: esbuild src/*.js src/atoms/*.js src/grid/*.jsx src/hooks/*.js src/molecules/*.jsx src/organisms/*.jsx src/tailwind/js/*.js src/templates/*.jsx src/third-party/*.jsx src/utils/*.js --outdir=dist --target=chrome95
scripts.dev: esbuild src/*.js src/atoms/*.js src/grid/*.jsx src/hooks/*.js src/molecules/*.jsx src/organisms/*.jsx src/tailwind/js/*.js src/templates/*.jsx src/third-party/*.jsx src/utils/*.js --outdir=dist --target=chrome95 --watch
